meanings.sent1: The novations in technology have greatly improved our lives.
meanings.sent2: She was recognized for her novations in the field of medicine.
meanings.sent3: The novations in fashion this season are quite exciting.
meanings.sent4: His novations in music have brought a fresh perspective to the industry.
meanings.sent5: The novations in education are shaping the future of learning.

meanings.definition: The act of innovating or introducing something new
meanings.sent1: Her constant novations in the company kept it ahead of the competition.
meanings.sent2: The novations in technology are driving progress in society.
meanings.sent3: The novations in the kitchen resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: His novations in business strategies led to increased profits.
meanings.sent5: The novations in design have captured the attention of many.

meanings.definition: A new method, idea, or product
meanings.sent1: The novations in communication have made staying in touch easier.
meanings.sent2: The novations in architecture are pushing boundaries of creativity.
meanings.sent3: The novations in gardening tools made yard work more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her novations in fashion design set new trends in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The novations in transportation have revolutionized how we travel.
